description.narrative: Building on the positive results of the GTAF III project, Enabel aims at capitalising the results yield so far, to improve the PFM system in the sector, by providing technical support to improve the planning and budgeting process, by focussing on the main objective of the sector, that is providing more and better primary health services to the population. Whilst the production of services is mentioned in the main objective of the Health National Strategy, the perspective is neither integrated in the planning and budgeting system nor is the focus of the dialogue between donors and government. Bringing the attention to this basic definition and use it to drive the policy formulation as well as the budget formulation is the ultimate objective of a functioning PFM system: offering tools to implement the government (fiscal) policy.
